trans-unit.source: Store email addresses that are associated with an email message.
trans-unit.target: 儲存與電子郵件訊息建立關聯的電子郵件地址。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailMessage.To%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailMessage.CC%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, and <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailMessage.Bcc%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> properties return instances of this class that are used to hold the respective email addresses.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailMessage.To%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailMessage.CC%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>，和<xref:System.Net.Mail.MailMessage.Bcc%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性會傳回此類別用來保存個別的電子郵件地址的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: For details on the mail address formats supported by the <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailAddressCollection> class, see the <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailAddress> class.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，在支援的郵件地址格式<xref:System.Net.Mail.MailAddressCollection>類別，請參閱<xref:System.Net.Mail.MailAddress>類別。

trans-unit.source: The following example adds an email address to the <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailAddressCollection> that is returned by the <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailMessage.Bcc%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將電子郵件地址<xref:System.Net.Mail.MailAddressCollection>所傳回<xref:System.Net.Mail.MailMessage.Bcc%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an empty instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Mail.MailAddressCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Net.Mail.MailAddressCollection" /> 類別的空執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The email addresses to add to the <see cref="T:System.Net.Mail.MailAddressCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 要新增至 <see cref="T:System.Net.Mail.MailAddressCollection" /> 的電子郵件地址。

trans-unit.source: Multiple email addresses must be separated with a comma character (",").
trans-unit.target: 必須使用逗號字元 (",") 分隔多個電子郵件地址。

trans-unit.source: Add a list of email addresses to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 將電子郵件地址清單新增至集合。

trans-unit.source: If multiple email addresses separated with a semicolon character (";") are passed in the `addresses` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 如果以分號分隔多個電子郵件地址 （";"） 會在傳遞`addresses`參數。

trans-unit.source: a <xref:System.FormatException> exception is raised.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.FormatException>引發例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="addresses" /> parameter is null.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="addresses" /> 參數為 null。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="addresses" /> parameter is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="addresses" /> 參數為空字串。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="addresses" /> parameter contains an email address that is invalid or not supported.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="addresses" /> 參數包含無效或不支援的電子郵件地址。

trans-unit.source: The location at which to insert the email address that is specified by <c>item</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要插入電子郵件地址的位置，由「項目」<c></c>指定。

trans-unit.source: The email address to be inserted into the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要插入集合中的電子郵件地址。

trans-unit.source: Inserts an email address into the <see cref="T:System.Net.Mail.MailAddressCollection" />, at the specified location.
trans-unit.target: 將電子郵件地址插入 <see cref="T:System.Net.Mail.MailAddressCollection" /> 中的指定位置。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="item" /> parameter is null.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="item" /> 參數為 null。

trans-unit.source: The index of the email address element to be replaced.
trans-unit.target: 要取代之電子郵件地址項目的索引。

trans-unit.source: An email address that will replace the element in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 用來取代集合中項目的電子郵件地址。

trans-unit.source: Replaces the element at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 取代指定之索引處的項目。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="item" /> parameter is null.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="item" /> 參數為 null。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string representation of the email addresses in this <see cref="T:System.Net.Mail.MailAddressCollection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回這個 <see cref="T:System.Net.Mail.MailAddressCollection" /> 物件中電子郵件地址的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> containing the email addresses in this collection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，包含這個集合中的電子郵件地址。

trans-unit.source: When this collection contains multiple addresses, they are separated by a comma character (",").
trans-unit.target: 當這個集合包含多個地址時，會以逗號字元分隔 （"，"）。

trans-unit.source: The following example displays the email addresses in the <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailAddressCollection> that are returned by the <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailMessage.Bcc%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會顯示在電子郵件地址<xref:System.Net.Mail.MailAddressCollection>傳回<xref:System.Net.Mail.MailMessage.Bcc%2A>屬性。
